node.title: Northland township threatened by 600-hectare scrub fire
node.description: Thirty families in a Far North township have spent the night in a school after they were evacuated because of a 600-hectare scrub fire. Audio
node.content:
["Thirty families in a Far North township have spent the night in a school after they were evacuated because of a 600-hectare scrub fire.", "", "
A 600-hectare blaze is threatening the Far North township of Kaimaumau. Photo: Supplied/Mary-Jane Hoult
", "Fire and Emergency Services started the evacuation of the small town of Kaimaumau about 8pm yesterday evening, with everyone out by 11pm.", "A change of wind direction and heavy due has meant the spread of the fire slowed significantly overnight, but it is still burning out of control on Department of Conservation land.", "Fire and Emergency Northland district manager Wipari Henwood told Morning Report a strong northerly wind forecast for this afternoon will make things tougher.", "Henwood confirmed no homes were damaged overnight.", "He said they have today increased crew capacity to utilise nine helicopters and four ground crews to get the blaze under control.", "Henwood said they have also brought in a specialist structural protection team to protect homes in the town.", "Unusual weather conditions for this time of year had slightly hampered the fire service's ability to reach points of the blaze, he said.", ""It's really swampy so gaining access to the actual fireline has been difficult which is just another problem for us," Henwood said.", "Increased fire activity was expected today, particularly around the 'witching hour' between 3pm and 4pm, which Henwood said is the most dangerous time for fires.", "Despite the tough terrain, high winds had been the biggest contributor to the spread of the fire, he said.", "Far North mayor John Carter has visited the school evacuation centre at Waiharara and said the 30 families there are being given food and are well settled.", ""There didn't seem to be any issues, people are obviously concerned with their homes but all in all it was well run, settled and people were well-focused and helping each other," Carter said.", "He said there were worries about the northerly wind expected today, but he is confident there are enough resources to hand to fight the blaze.", ""We'll do our best to be ahead of the [wind] but the guys are working their butts off so hopefully we can get it contained before that blows up on us."", ""The irony is that it's a swamp area which normally at this time of year is dry and it's now wet as and it's actually prevented us from getting in there on foot that's why we've got the helicopters here."", "Carter was set to meet with members of the community and civil defence this morning to plan to fit the needs of the evacuated families.", "Carter confirmed Kaimaumau is the only town being threatened by the fire and commended the efforts the local fire services had made in difficult conditions.", "Meanwhile across the bay in Rangiputa, Reef Lodge Motel manager Leslie McCormick said the fire spread fiercely after a wind change.", "She said ash and burnt debris have been dropping on the beach and residents have all windows closed.", "They have been advised to disconnect their water tanks."]
